of<TS>home<TS>entertainment<TS>electronics<TS>in<TS>1960<TS>was<TS>about<TS>$1.9<TS>billion<TS>,<TS>compared<TS>to<TS>$1.7<TS>billion<TS>in<TS>1959<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>government<ENDLABEL>It<TS>concerns<TS>itself<TS>with<TS>:<TS>1<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>government<ENDLABEL>In<TS>sixteen<TS>states<TS>,<TS>the<TS>fiscal<TS>year<TS>ending<TS>of<TS>the<TS>cities<TS>(<TS>June<TS>30<TS>)<TS>is<TS>the<TS>same<TS>as<TS>that<TS>of<TS>the<TS>state<TS>:<TS>Alaska<TS>,<TS>Arizona<TS>,<TS>California<TS>,<TS>Delaware<TS>,<TS>Massachusetts<TS>,<TS>Montana<TS>,<TS>Nevada<TS>,<TS>New<TS>Mexico<TS>,<TS>North<TS>Carolina<TS>,<TS>North<TS>Dakota<TS>,<TS>Oklahoma<TS>,<TS>Oregon<TS>,<TS>Vermont<TS>,<TS>West<TS>Virginia<TS>,<TS>Wyoming<TS>,<TS>and<TS>Hawaii<TS>)<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>government<ENDLABEL>Mr.<TS>Sharpe's<TS>arrival<TS>in<TS>the<TS>business<TS>did<TS>indeed<TS>provide<TS>what<TS>Mr.<TS>Brown<TS>had<TS>most<TS>coveted<TS>--<TS>time<TS>for<TS>``<TS>tinkering<TS>''<TS>,<TS>and<TS>the<TS>opportunity<TS>of<TS>carrying<TS>out<TS>in<TS>the<TS>back<TS>room<TS>those<TS>developments<TS>in<TS>precision<TS>graduation<TS>which<TS>most<TS>interested<TS>him<TS>at<TS>that<TS>time<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>government<ENDLABEL>353<TS>U.<TS>S.<TS>,<TS>at<TS>606<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>government<ENDLABEL>These<TS>amendments<TS>to<TS>the<TS>Vocational<TS>Rehabilitation<TS>Act<TS>were<TS>designed<TS>to<TS>help<TS>provide<TS>for<TS>more<TS>specialized<TS>rehabilitation<TS>facilities<TS>,<TS>for<TS>more<TS>sheltered<TS>and<TS>``<TS>half-way<TS>''<TS>workshops<TS>,<TS>for<TS>greater<TS>numbers<TS>of<TS>adequately<TS>trained<TS>personnel<TS>,<TS>for<TS>more<TS>comprehensive<TS>services<TS>to<TS>individuals<TS>(<TS>particularly<TS>to<TS>the<TS>homebound<TS>and<TS>the<TS>blind<TS>)<TS>,<TS>and<TS>for<TS>other<TS>administrative<TS>improvements<TS>to<TS>increase<TS>the<TS>program's<TS>overall<TS>effectiveness<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>government<ENDLABEL>Two<TS>walls<TS>of<TS>concrete<TS>blocks<TS>are<TS>constructed<TS>at<TS>least<TS>20<TS>inches< <TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>Gear<TS>ratio<TS>--<TS>speed<TS>relationships<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>The<TS>recommended<TS>10-milligram<TS>daily<TS>intake<TS>level<TS>should<TS>be<TS>maintained<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>True<TS>,<TS>a<TS>Mason<TS>watercolor<TS>is<TS>unmistakably<TS>a<TS>synthesis<TS>of<TS>nature<TS>rather<TS>than<TS>a<TS>detailed<TS>inventory<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>A<TS>replica<TS>of<TS>two<TS>coaches<TS>made<TS>in<TS>England<TS>for<TS>the<TS>Belmont<TS>Club<TS>in<TS>the<TS>East<TS>,<TS>and<TS>matchless<TS>west<TS>of<TS>the<TS>Rockies<TS>,<TS>it<TS>was<TS>the<TS>despair<TS>of<TS>whips<TS>on<TS>the<TS>Santa<TS>Cruz<TS>run<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>For<TS>this<TS>first<TS>development<TS>the<TS>supplier<TS>signing<TS>the<TS>lease<TS>is<TS>a<TS>major<TS>oil<TS>company<TS>but<TS>in<TS>turn<TS>the<TS>deal<TS>is<TS>being<TS>transferred<TS>for<TS>operation<TS>to<TS>its<TS>local<TS>fueloil<TS>distributor<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>These<TS>are<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>Union<TS>soldiers<TS>at<TS>times<TS>used<TS>it<TS>for<TS>sleeping<TS>quarters<TS>to<TS>escape<TS>from<TS>the<TS>rain<TS>or<TS>other<TS>inclement<TS>weather<TS>,<TS>and<TS>some<TS>of<TS>them<TS>left<TS>momentoes<TS>of<TS>their<TS>stay<TS>by<TS>carving<TS>their<TS>names<TS>and<TS>small<TS>tokens<TS>on<TS>its<TS>walls<TS>and<TS>beams<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>In<TS>the<TS>colder<TS>climes<TS>,<TS>for<TS>instance<TS>,<TS>you<TS>will<TS>have<TS>to<TS>live<TS>through<TS>the<TS>many<TS>unglamorous<TS>winter<TS>months<TS>when<TS>your<TS>pool<TS>will<TS>hardly<TS>look<TS>its<TS>best<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>It<TS>was<TS>indeed<TS>a<TS>remarkable<TS>feat<TS>that<TS>a<TS>man<TS>who<TS>had<TS>had<TS>no<TS>experience<TS>of<TS>bridge<TS>building<TS>should<TS>have<TS>applied<TS>the<TS>principle<TS>of<TS>the<TS>arch<TS>,<TS>which<TS>appears<TS>in<TS>his<TS>famous<TS>bridges<TS>at<TS>Portsmouth<TS>,<TS>Haverhill<TS>,<TS>and<TS>Philadelphia<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>h <TS>,<TS>acrylic<TS>,<TS>with<TS>its<TS>outstanding<TS>optical<TS>characteristics<TS>,<TS>weather<TS>resistance<TS>and<TS>formability<TS>,<TS>strongly<TS>dominates<TS>the<TS>picture<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>''<TS>thick<TS>and<TS>1''<TS>''<TS>dia.<TS>fitted<TS>on<TS>a<TS>1/8''<TS>''<TS>dia.<TS>mandrel<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>The<TS>door<TS>panels<TS>are<TS>designed<TS>to<TS>accommodate<TS>standard<TS>doors<TS>which<TS>should<TS>be<TS>of<TS>exterior<TS>grade<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>You'll<TS>have<TS>the<TS>neighbor's<TS>eyes<TS>popping<TS>as<TS>well<TS>as<TS>their<TS>mouths<TS>watering<TS>!<TS>!<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>At<TS>the<TS>peak<TS>of<TS>the<TS>arch<TS>,<TS>tip<TS>the<TS>head<TS>back<TS>and<TS>bend<TS>the<TS>knees<TS>in<TS>an<TS>effort<TS>to<TS>touch<TS>toes<TS>to<TS>head<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>Designers<TS>of<TS>signs<TS>and<TS>displays<TS>have<TS>shown<TS>a<TS>refreshing<TS>approach<TS>to<TS>the<TS>adaptation<TS>of<TS>plastics<TS>that<TS>has<TS>influenced<TS>the<TS>workings<TS>of<TS>other<TS>industries<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>The<TS>last-named<TS>is<TS>one<TS>of<TS>the<TS>favorites<TS>in<TS>the<TS>stable<TS>,<TS>and<TS>the<TS>boys<TS>like<TS>her<TS>very<TS>much<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>On<TS>May<TS>11,330<TS>,<TS>A.D.<TS>,<TS>,<TS>its<TS>name<TS>was<TS>changed<TS>again<TS>,<TS>this<TS>time<TS>to<TS>Constantinople<TS>after<TS>its<TS>emperor<TS>,<TS>Constantine<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>Other<TS>winners<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>When<TS>aircraft<TS>are<TS>no<TS>longer<TS>helpless<TS>on<TS>airfields<TS>,<TS>they<TS>are<TS>no<TS>longer<TS>vulnerable<TS>to<TS>Aj<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>.<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>television<TS>;<TS>;<BEGINLABEL>hobbies<ENDLABEL>If<TS>you<TS>are<TS>dreaming<TS>of<TS>a<TS>blue<TS>,<TS>shimmering<TS>pool<TS>right<TS>outside<TS>your<TS>living<TS>room<TS>windows<TS>,<TS>close<TS>your<TS>eyes<TS>firmly<TS>and<TS>fill<TS>in<TS>the<TS>picture<TS>with<TS>lots<TS> <TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>This<TS>leaves<TS>the<TS>ordering<TS>of<TS>entries<TS>variable<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>Besides<TS>the<TS>presence<TS>of<TS>goitrogens<TS>in<TS>the<TS>diet<TS>,<TS>the<TS>level<TS>of<TS>iodine<TS>itself<TS>in<TS>the<TS>diet<TS>plays<TS>a<TS>major<TS>role<TS>in<TS>governing<TS>the<TS>activity<TS>of<TS>the<TS>thyroid<TS>gland<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>)<TS>But<TS>the<TS>inner<TS>,<TS>formal<TS>logic<TS>of<TS>Cubism<TS>,<TS>as<TS>it<TS>worked<TS>itself<TS>out<TS>through<TS>the<TS>collage<TS>,<TS>had<TS>just<TS>as<TS>much<TS>to<TS>do<TS>with<TS>shaping<TS>their<TS>decision<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>Then<TS>China<TS>promptly<TS>went<TS>Communist<TS>,<TS>and<TS>Mr.<TS>Truman<TS>had<TS>to<TS>fight<TS>the<TS>interminable<TS>Korean<TS>war<TS>for<TS>the<TS>democratization<TS>of<TS>Korea<TS>before<TS>we<TS>learned<TS>how<TS>far<TS>our<TS>writ<TS>did<TS>``<TS>reach<TS>in<TS>Asia<TS>''<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>occurrence<TS>--<TS>an<TS>instance<TS>of<TS>a<TS>form<TS>in<TS>text<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>The<TS>heart<TS>weighed<TS>510<TS>gm.<TS>,<TS>and<TS>at<TS>the<TS>outflow<TS>tracts<TS>the<TS>left<TS>and<TS>right<TS>ventricles<TS>measured<TS>19<TS>and<TS>3<TS>mm.<TS>,<TS>respectively<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>the<TS>magnetic<TS>moment<TS>of<TS>an<TS>unpaired<TS>electron<TS>associated<TS>nearby<TS>may<TS>have<TS>a<TS>tremendous<TS>influence<TS>on<TS>the<TS>magnetic<TS>resonance<TS>properties<TS>of<TS>nuclei<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>Of<TS>primary<TS>interest<TS>are<TS>meats<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>In<TS>this<TS>test<TS>a<TS>Af<TS>tape<TS>was<TS>pulled<TS>between<TS>the<TS>blocks<TS>with<TS>a<TS>motor<TS>and<TS>pulley<TS>at<TS>a<TS>rate<TS>of<TS>Af<TS>with<TS>a<TS>clearance<TS>of<TS>0.002''<TS>''<TS>on<TS>each<TS>side<TS>of<TS>the<TS>tape<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>learned<ENDLABEL>In<TS>1922<TS>a<TS>continuous<TS>registration<TS>of<TS>the<TS>whole<TS>indigenous<TS>population<TS>was<TS>instituted< ;<TS>;<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>Attempts<TS>at<TS>censorship<TS>always<TS>involve<TS>and<TS>reveal<TS>such<TS>complex<TS>and<TS>multiple<TS>individual<TS>reactions<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>Gorham<TS>refused<TS>to<TS>accept<TS>money<TS>for<TS>slave<TS>property<TS>,<TS>but<TS>did<TS>he<TS>realize<TS>how<TS>much<TS>expense<TS>and<TS>trouble<TS>the<TS>transportation<TS>of<TS>his<TS>Negroes<TS>to<TS>the<TS>North<TS>involved<TS>?<TS>?<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>Boys<TS>no<TS>longer<TS>bothered<TS>learning<TS>to<TS>bunt<TS>and<TS>even<TS>school<TS>kids<TS>scorned<TS>to<TS>``<TS>choke<TS>up<TS>''<TS>on<TS>a<TS>bat<TS>as<TS>Willie<TS>Keeler<TS>and<TS>the<TS>famous<TS>hitters<TS>of<TS>another<TS>day<TS>had<TS>done<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>This<TS>led<TS>to<TS>the<TS>famous<TS>sayin'<TS>in<TS>the<TS>Northwest<TS>of<TS>the<TS>``<TS>books<TS>won't<TS>freeze<TS>''<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>Of<TS>all<TS>the<TS>thousands<TS>of<TS>men<TS>who<TS>have<TS>served<TS>in<TS>the<TS>7th<TS>Cav<TS>,<TS>perhaps<TS>no<TS>one<TS>knows<TS>its<TS>spirit<TS>better<TS>than<TS>Lieutenant<TS>Colonel<TS>Melbourne<TS>C.<TS>Chandler<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>The<TS>latter<TS>plays<TS>a<TS>prominent<TS>role<TS>in<TS>Roman<TS>Catholic<TS>theology<TS>and<TS>is<TS>considered<TS>decisive<TS>,<TS>entirely<TS>apart<TS>from<TS>Scripture<TS>,<TS>in<TS>determining<TS>the<TS>ethical<TS>character<TS>of<TS>birth-prevention<TS>methods<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>Most<TS>adolescents<TS>have<TS>some<TS>ideological<TS>diffusion<TS>at<TS>various<TS>developmental<TS>stages<TS>,<TS>as<TS>they<TS>experience<TS>a<TS>proliferation<TS>of<TS>ideas<TS>and<TS>values<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>Seeds<TS>of<TS>soybean<TS>,<TS>cotton<TS>,<TS>corn<TS>,<TS>sesame<TS>,<TS>and<TS>rape<TS>yield<TS>semidrying<TS>oils<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>President<TS>Dickey's<TS>golden<TS>retriever<TS>,<TS>frolicking<TS>in<TS>the<TS>snow<TS>at<TS>his<TS>feet<TS>,<TS>added<TS>to<TS>the<TS>picture<TS>of<TS>masculine<TS>informali <TS>is<TS>working<TS>in<TS>this<TS>experiment<TS>are<TS>in<TS>a<TS>waking<TS>or<TS>only<TS>slightly<TS>dissociated<TS>state<TS>,<TS>so<TS>that<TS>the<TS>sitter<TS>can<TS>make<TS>comments<TS>,<TS>ask<TS>and<TS>answer<TS>questions<TS>,<TS>instead<TS>of<TS>talking<TS>with<TS>a<TS>``<TS>control<TS>''<TS>who<TS>speaks<TS>through<TS>an<TS>entranced<TS>sensitive<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>The<TS>great<TS>world<TS>beyond<TS>beckons<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>The<TS>ship's<TS>compass<TS>was<TS>useless<TS>because<TS>of<TS>the<TS>nearness<TS>of<TS>the<TS>magnetic<TS>North<TS>Pole<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>When<TS>the<TS>visitors<TS>,<TS>after<TS>losing<TS>this<TS>game<TS>,<TS>rode<TS>along<TS>the<TS>village<TS>streets<TS>toward<TS>home<TS>,<TS>the<TS>youngsters<TS>who<TS>could<TS>keep<TS>abreast<TS>of<TS>them<TS>for<TS>a<TS>moment<TS>or<TS>two<TS>screamed<TS>triumphantly<TS>,<TS>``<TS>You<TS>bunch<TS>of<TS>hay-shakers<TS>!<TS>!<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>She<TS>had<TS>taught<TS>classes<TS>in<TS>botany<TS>,<TS>astronomy<TS>(<TS>with<TS>the<TS>aid<TS>of<TS>a<TS>telescope<TS>)<TS>,<TS>geometry<TS>,<TS>and<TS>psychology<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>She's<TS>just<TS>the<TS>other<TS>side<TS>of<TS>that<TS>bush<TS>''<TS>!<TS>!<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>This<TS>viewpoint<TS>has<TS>now<TS>been<TS>translated<TS>into<TS>action<TS>by<TS>the<TS>majority<TS>of<TS>people<TS>in<TS>this<TS>country<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>The<TS>separate<TS>vocational<TS>or<TS>technical<TS>high<TS>schools<TS>in<TS>the<TS>large<TS>cities<TS>must<TS>be<TS>reckoned<TS>as<TS>permanent<TS>institutions<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>It<TS>is<TS>the<TS>way<TS>you<TS>were<TS>taught<TS>and<TS>your<TS>way<TS>of<TS>life<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>The<TS>problems<TS>confuse<TS>even<TS>the<TS>experts<TS>.<BEGINLABEL>lore<ENDLABEL>In<TS>answering<TS>these<TS>questions<TS>,<TS>we<TS>need<TS>to<TS>ask<TS>not<TS>merely<TS>whether<TS>Communist<TS>troops<TS>have<TS>crossed<TS>over<TS>into<TS>territories<TS>they<TS>
